name: Jack Rasmussen
review: I've known Pastor Reid for several years, since his church supports our Gideons ministry.  We can't wait for their congregation to move in to their new home in Petaluma.

name: Kristie Meyer
review: Quiet and kind bible study. Lovely service. The pastor's wife was very sweet and kind. I felt welcomed and got a warm feeling sitting near her.

name: sebastian romero
review: It was lovely to find brothers and sisters from another country and share some time with them in the name of Christ
